Installation
~~~~~~~~~~~~

The easiest way to install this package is using pip with the command:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install PyISY

Requirements
~~~~~~~~~~~~

This package requires two other packages, also available from pip. They are
installed automatically when PyISY is installed using pip.

* `requests <http://docs.python-requests.org/en/latest/>`_
* `VarEvents <http://automic.us/projects/varevents/>`_
